title: China calls virus lawsuit brought by US state 'very absurd'
description: BEIJING (AP) — China on Wednesday slammed a lawsuit brought against it by the U.S. state of Missouri over the coronavirus pandemic as “very absurd."  Foreign ministry spokesman Geng Shuang...
content:
BEIJING (AP) China on Wednesday slammed a lawsuit brought against it by the U.S. state of Missouri over the coronavirus pandemic as very absurd. 
Foreign ministry spokesman Geng Shuang said the legal action has no factual and legal basis at all and repeated … [+1643 chars]
